Text.Page:
I'll report back to the captain directly, but if you could take my report on to the team investigating the ruins, it'd be a big help.

I guess my gut was wrong.

Hebbin sent you? When we didn't hear from her, we were certain her skull was split by a kulkari axe.

Our investigations are proceeding, but they'll go more smoothly now that we aren't constantly looking over our shoulders. Thank you.
